titleStmt.title: By the King. A licence for a collection throughout England and Wales, towards the redeeming of a number of poore English men captiues vnder Muley Abdawelly King of Morocco.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: VVestminster the fifteenth day of October, in the seuenth yeare of our reigne.
Arms 28; Steele notation: faith, small date.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
